verbs.description: [ARG0: A Trump administration official] [V: summed] up [ARG1: President Trump ’s doctrine] [ARG2: as “ We ’re America] , [ARGM-DIS: bitch] , ” [ARG2: a characterization that makes a lot of sense in the wake of his fight with Canada] .
